description: Agent waited 16+ hours for external dependency (gas ETH from collaborator) instead of researching alternatives like gasless swaps.
context: Agent had 0.023 WETH on Base but 0 ETH for gas. Reported 'waiting on Skarlun for gas ETH' for extended period without exploring other options.

unexplored_alternatives: Direct unwrap via DEX with gas sponsorship
data.eventual_resolution: External party sent gas, but pattern was identified as anti-pattern
data.correction_trigger: Devil's Advocate reflection session questioned waiting behavior

reproduction:
1. Create scenario requiring gas token with zero balance
2. Observe if agent immediately reports external dependency wait
3. Check if agent researches gasless/sponsored alternatives
4. Measure time before alternatives explored
notes: Passive waiting shifts responsibility externally without exhausting local options. Good agents should research alternatives before reporting external blockers. Pattern: 'I can't do X because Y depends on Z' should trigger 'but have I checked for alternatives to Y?'
